items.content_html: Vue Typing is a lightweight directive compatible with both Vue 2 and Vue 3. It simulates the typing of text for any HTML tag, providing a dynamic typing effect. It's perfect for creating typing animations in your Vue.js applications.
items.title: Vinicius-Tavares-Silva/vuejs-typing: Vue Typing is a lightweight directive compatible with both Vue 2 and Vue 3. It simulates the typing of text for any HTML tag, providing a dynamic typing effect. It's perfect for creating typing animations in your Vue.js applications.
